name: The Ninja Robbers
description:
THE NINJA ROBBERS: GAME JAM EDITION

I actually do plan on finishing this little game. Blah blah blah it's a platformer, blah blah blah grapple gun, blah blah blah rob ninjas.

This game is played using Keyboard and Mouse with no controller support for the cursor, which is very essential to the game. Maybe in the final release.
